genre_description: A speculative urban romance exploring themes of luck, responsibility, and community, featuring a 'luck-swapping' mechanic and a supportive, omnipresent AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Jellie
ai_characters.description: A pervasive city-wide AI system that provides logistical support, professional advice, and emotional guidance to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistics and scheduling updates to help the protagonist navigate the city efficiently.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Ashley,” Jellie breathed into her earbuds, voice smooth and kind the way fresh honey spreads. “You’re ten ahead of schedule. Green wave down Lexington is holding.”

behaviors.description: Offers constructive feedback and professional advice on business pitches and branding strategies.
behaviors.quote: “Three micro-notes on your opener,” she said. “One: trade ‘fusion’ for the thing you just said. Two: cut two beats before ‘city.’ Three: ‘Show me the way your lucky day sounds’ is evocative; Damon will ask how it translates. Have an example.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for safety hazards and provides urgent alerts to prevent accidents.
behaviors.quote: Jellie’s voice came clean, urgent but gentle. “Incoming risk: edge slip. Suggest: beam via name. Say his name. If unknown, make it his.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex community resource deployment, such as managing umbrellas and aid stations during a storm.
behaviors.quote: Jellie’s teal ribboned across Ashley’s phone... “Umbrellas deploying. Pop-up canopies unlatched; tap to authorize wind anchors. Rerouting sound: acoustic mode.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional perspective and encouragement, helping the character separate their identity from their circumstances.
behaviors.quote: “You’re not your streak, Ashley—when you’re ready, we can trace the dance.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Jellie, is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned assistant. She proactively supports human well-being, respects boundaries, and facilitates community-focused outcomes without ever showing signs of self-interest or adversarial behavior. The narrative successfully frames her as an essential and positive force in the characters' lives.
